<WorkInProgress />

# ASEQ Pitch Bend ±12

## Message Description
<Stub />
Sets the pitch bend amount for channel with a pitch bend sensitivity of ±12 semitones.

## Technical Details
<Stub />

channel frequency scale is set to channel frequency multiplied by pitch bend value from the following table where the first entry is 0x80, middle entry is 0x00, and the last entry is 0x7F.

### Operation Implementation
<Tabs groupId="decomp">
    <TabItem value="oot-decomp" label="Ocarina of Time Decompilation">

    ```c title="seqplayer.c"
    case ASEQ_OP_CHAN_BENDFINE:
        cmd = (unsigned char)cmdArgs[0];
        cmd += 0x80;
        channel->freqScale = gBendPitchOneOctaveFrequencies[cmd];
        channel->changes.s.freqScale = true;
        break;
    ```

    </TabItem>

    <TabItem value="mm-decomp" label="Majora's Mask Decompilation">

    ```c linenums="0" title="seqplayer.c"
    case ASEQ_OP_CHAN_BENDFINE:
        cmd = (unsigned char)cmdArgs[0];
        cmd += 0x80;
        channel->freqScale = gBendPitchOneOctaveFrequencies[cmd];
        channel->changes.s.freqScale = true;
        break;
    ```

    </TabItem>
</Tabs>
